name: Fasykull
description:
Game is a simple survival game that you can chop down trees , collect resources , craft something and survive from enemies.

There is random generated worlds , random generated mobs , save/load system

// |--| Release Notes For 1.0.0.45 |--| //

-Added Giving Name For Maps

     +Added Rename Button

-Added Crystals

     +Can Be Found In Their Own Biomes

-Added Portal Frame

     +Can Be Found Random Place In World

-Added New Boss

-Added End For Game

-Added New Crafts

-Changed Craft System (a little bit..)

-Added Arrow

      +Can Be Craft "Wood + Stone"

     +Can Be Throw By Pressing "E"

-Added Trident

     +Can be Found In Random Place In The World

     +Can Be Throw By Pressing "R"

-Bugs Fixed

//|--|Release Notes For 1.0.0.41|--|//

- Added Potion

-Can Be found in randomly generated chests

-Release Notes for 1.0.0.40

- Map size increased from 1920x1080 to 7680x4320

- Added Slymes

- Slymes is attacking you if they see you

- You can hide from Slymes with hiding in bushs

-  Added HP

- When You Die Your Inventory Is Deleting

- Added Chunk System For Bigger Fpsies
